item.title: Hacker101 CTF: Micro-CMS v1 Writeup
item.description: Hacker101 CTF: Micro-CMS v1 Writeup 1. Exploration Landing page shows two files. Looks like we are going to deal with markdown. Creating new page allows us to put in title and some content. Fact: markdown supports html. This means we can try all sorts of XSS attacks. Script tag doesn’t work. 2. Enumeration ┌──(kali㉿kali)-[~] └─$ gobuster dir -w /usr/share/wordlists/dirbuster/directory-list-2.3-medium.txt -x 'php,html,txt' -t 32 -q -u http://35.190.155.168/46a90aa06a/page/ /10 (Status: 200) [Size: 309] /11 (Status: 200) [Size: 213] /1 (Status: 200) [Size: 239] /01 (Status: 200) [Size: 239] /2 (Status: 200) [Size: 433] /07 (Status: 403) [Size: 234] 10 & 11 are pages I created for funsies, and 1 & 2 were there already.
